summary: Changes Serana to be a bit rougher around the edges and more vampiric.
descriptionHtml:
This is a quick mod I made that changes Serana\'s appearance to make her look a bit rougher around the edges, more like a vampire and generally a bit less pretty while still keeping more or less in line with her vanilla appearance.

With this mod, Serana\'s eyebrows are a different style and lower on her face, her face is more sunken, her lips are thinner, her face dirtier (she did spend several hundred years trapped in a block of stone!) and she also has a scar now.

As with any other mod, just sling everything inside the .zip file in the data folder of your Skyrim directory. Should be compatible with most mods (apart from ones that alter Serana, of course). If you are using UFO, please place this mod underneath UFO.

If you\'d like to suggest ideas for an alternative version, tell me about bugs associated with this mod (not that I\'d imagine there are any) and whatnot, just drop a comment in the comments section!

Eyes in the main version are provided by Nevenbridge. Fantastic eye textures, go check them out! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589
author: Eyil

files.name: New Serana Face - Original Eye Textures
files.fileName: New Serana Face - Original Eye Textures-27500-.zip
